Package theater

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Flowchart.EdgeConsumer
    A functional interface to describe the action to be taken for each edge in a graph search of the flowchart.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor<PayloadT>  
    Causality  
    EnactNode  
    EndNode  
    Flowchart  
    FlowchartUtils
    Utilities class for Flowchart: array conversion functions.
    Node  
    Pair<T,U>  
    Part  
    Play<P>  
    RootNode  
    RunNode<P extends Actor<?>>

    TestNode<P extends Actor<?>>  
    Tip  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Outcome  
    Server.RunStatus
    Enumerates the possible states of the Server, that is, whether it is running, stopped or aborted (abruptly stopped).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Actor.AlreadyLoadedException
    An exception raised when the Actor is asked to load another Part.
    Actor.NotLoadedException
    An exception raised when the Actor is requested to Actor.perform() but it does not have any Part to interpret.
    Play.LoopFoundException
    A private exception for catching loops in the running graph.
